subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: To begin to understand how a struggling nation like Serbia managed to reach its first Davis Cup final, look no further than three tennis courts at the ski resort Kopaonik, where Novak Djokovic got his start.
snippet: To begin to understand how a struggling nation like Serbia managed to reach its first Davis Cup final, look no further than three tennis courts at the ski resort Kopaonik, where Novak Djokovic got his start.
